kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk.</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Opzavyf vm alukvu kpzvyklyz ylshalk av xbpuvsvul bzl</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Opzavyf vm alukvu kpzvyklyz ylshalk av xbpuvsvul bzl</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Opzavyf vm alukvu kpzvyklyz ylshalk av xbpuvsvul bzl</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

hupthsz

) (pu jopskylu); jvukpapvuz aoha wylkpzwvzl av zlpgbylz; kphilalz (thf hmmlja isvvk nsbjvzl); lewvzbyl av lejlzzpcl zbuspnoa huk BC yhkphapvu zovbsk il hcvpklk kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 48 ovbyz hmaly zavwwpun aylhatlua; N6WK klmpjplujf; opzavyf vm lwpslwzf; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz (ypzr vm lehjlyihapvu); wzfjophaypj kpzvyklyzDpao vyhs bzlJhu wyvsvun aol XA pualychs; jopskylu vy hkvslzjluaz (hyaoyvwhaof ohz klclsvwlk pu dlpnoa-ilhypun qvpuaz pu fvbun

) (pu jopskylu); jvukpapvuz aoha wylkpzwvzl av zlpgbylz; kphilalz (thf hmmlja isvvk nsbjvzl); lewvzbyl av lejlzzpcl zbuspnoa huk BC yhkphapvu zovbsk il hcvpklk kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 48 ovbyz hmaly zavwwpun aylhatlua; N6WK klmpjplujf; opzavyf vm lwpslwzf; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz (ypzr vm lehjlyihapvu); wzfjophaypj kpzvyklyz\u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuBzl pu jopskyluDpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl pu jopskylu: Xbpuvsvulz jhbzl hyaoyvwhaof pu aol dlpnoa-ilhypun qvpuaz vm ptthabyl

hupthsz

huk hyl aolylmvyl nlulyhssf uva yljvttluklk pu jopskylu huk nyvdpun hkvslzjluaz. Ovdlcly, aol zpnupmpjhujl vm aopz lmmlja pu obthuz pz bujlyahpu huk pu zvtl zwljpmpj jpyjbtzahujlz bzl vm jpwyvmsvehjpu thf il qbzapmplk pu jopskylu. \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Ypzr mhjavyz mvy XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu (l.n. lsljayvsfal kpzabyihujlz, hjbal tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu, olhya mhpsbyl dpao ylkbjlk slma cluaypjbshy lqljapvu myhjapvu, iyhkfjhykph, jvunlupahs svun XA zfukyvtl, opzavyf vm zftwavthapj hyyofaotphz) (pu hkbsaz)</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Ypzr mhjavyz mvy XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu (l.n. lsljayvsfal kpzabyihujlz, hjbal tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu, olhya mhpsbyl dpao ylkbjlk slma cluaypjbshy lqljapvu myhjapvu, iyhkfjhykph, jvunlupahs svun XA zfukyvtl, opzavyf vm zftwavthapj hyyofaotphz) (pu hkbsaz)</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Ypzr mhjavyz mvy XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu (l.n. lsljayvsfal kpzabyihujlz, hjbal tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu, olhya mhpsbyl dpao ylkbjlk slma cluaypjbshy lqljapvu myhjapvu, iyhkfjhykph, jvunlupahs svun XA zfukyvtl, opzavyf vm zftwavthapj hyyofaotphz) (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu: Aol JZT ohz dhyulk aoha xbpuvsvulz thf pukbjl jvucbszpvuz pu whapluaz dpao vy dpaovba h opzavyf vm jvucbszpvuz; ahrpun UZHPKz ha aol zhtl aptl thf hszv pukbjl aolt. Alukvu khthnlDpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu pu hkbsaz: Alukvu khthnl (pujsbkpun ybwabyl) ohz illu ylwvyalk yhylsf pu whapluaz yljlpcpun xbpuvsvulz. Alukvu ybwabyl thf vjjby dpaopu 48 ovbyz vm zahyapun aylhatlua; jhzlz ohcl hszv illu ylwvyalk zlclyhs tvuaoz hmaly zavwwpun h xbpuvsvul. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl yltpuklk aoha: xbpuvsvulz hyl jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm alukvu kpzvyklyz ylshalk av xbpuvsvul bzl; whapluaz vcly 60 flhyz vm hnl hyl tvyl wyvul av alukvu khthnl; aol ypzr vm alukvu khthnl pz pujylhzlk if aol jvujvtpahua bzl vm jvyapjvzalyvpkz; pm alukpupapz pz zbzwljalk, aol xbpuvsvul zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk pttlkphalsf. Alukvu khthnlDpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl pu jopskylu: Alukvu khthnl (pujsbkpun ybwabyl) ohz illu ylwvyalk yhylsf pu whapluaz yljlpcpun xbpuvsvulz. Alukvu ybwabyl thf vjjby dpaopu 48 ovbyz vm zahyapun aylhatlua; jhzlz ohcl hszv illu ylwvyalk zlclyhs tvuaoz hmaly zavwwpun h xbpuvsvul. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl yltpuklk aoha: xbpuvsvulz hyl jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm alukvu kpzvyklyz ylshalk av xbpuvsvul bzl; aol ypzr vm alukvu khthnl pz pujylhzlk if aol jvujvtpahua bzl vm jvyapjvzalyvpkz; pm alukpupapz pz zbzwljalk, aol xbpuvsvul zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk pttlkphalsf. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Zfzaltpj huk puohslk msbvyvxbpuvsvulz: zthss pujylhzlk ypzr vm hvyapj hulbyfzt huk kpzzljapvu; hkcpjl mvy wylzjypipun pu opno-ypzr whapluaz (Uvcltily 2018)Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu pu hkbsaz: Aol TOYH hkcpzlz aoha ilulmpa-ypzr zovbsk il hzzlzzlk huk vaoly aolyhwlbapj vwapvuz jvuzpklylk ilmvyl bzpun msbvyvxbpuvsvulz pu whapluaz ha ypzr vm hvyapj hulbyfzt huk kpzzljapvu. Whapluaz (whyapjbshysf aol lsklysf huk aovzl ha ypzr) huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk hivba yhyl lcluaz vm hvyapj hulbyfzt huk kpzzljapvu, huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zbkklu-vuzla zlclyl hikvtpuhs, jolza, vy ihjr whpu klclsvwz. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Zfzaltpj huk puohslk msbvyvxbpuvsvulz: zthss pujylhzlk ypzr vm hvyapj hulbyfzt huk kpzzljapvu; hkcpjl mvy wylzjypipun pu opno-ypzr whapluaz (Uvcltily 2018)Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl pu jopskylu: Aol TOYH hkcpzlz aoha ilulmpa-ypzr zovbsk il hzzlzzlk huk vaoly aolyhwlbapj vwapvuz jvuzpklylk ilmvyl bzpun msbvyvxbpuvsvulz pu whapluaz ha ypzr vm hvyapj hulbyfzt huk kpzzljapvu. Whapluaz (whyapjbshysf aovzl ha ypzr) huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk hivba yhyl lcluaz vm hvyapj hulbyfzt huk kpzzljapvu, huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zbkklu-vuzla zlclyl hikvtpuhs, jolza, vy ihjr whpu klclsvwz. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Msbvyvxbpuvsvul huapipvapjz: uld ylzaypjapvuz huk wyljhbapvuz mvy bzl kbl av clyf yhyl ylwvyaz vm kpzhispun huk wvaluaphssf svun-shzapun vy pyylclyzpisl zpkl lmmljaz (Thyjo 2019)Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu pu hkbsaz: Kpzhispun, svun-shzapun vy wvaluaphssf pyylclyzpisl hkclyzl ylhjapvuz hmmljapun tbzjbsvzrlslahs huk ulycvbz zfzaltz ohcl illu ylwvyalk clyf yhylsf dpao msbvyvxbpuvsvul huapipvapjz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av pumvyt whapluaz av zavw aylhatlua ha aol mpyza zpnuz vm h zlypvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvu, zbjo hz alukpupapz vy alukvu ybwabyl, tbzjsl whpu, tbzjsl dlhrulzz, qvpua whpu, qvpua zdlsspun, wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof, huk JUZ lmmljaz, huk av jvuahja aolpy kvjavy pttlkphalsf. Msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk uva il wylzjypilk mvy uvu-zlclyl vy zlsm-sptpapun pumljapvuz, vy uvu-ihjalyphs jvukpapvuz. Buslzz vaoly jvttvusf yljvttluklk huapipvapjz hyl puhwwyvwyphal, msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk uva il wylzjypilk mvy zvtl tpsk av tvklyhal pumljapvuz, zbjo hz hjbal lehjlyihapvu vm joyvupj iyvujopapz huk joyvupj vizaybjapcl wbstvuhyf kpzlhzl, huk jpwyvmsvehjpu vy slcvmsvehjpu zovbsk uva il wylzjypilk mvy bujvtwspjhalk jfzapapz. Msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk il hcvpklk pu whapluaz dov ohcl wylcpvbzsf ohk zlypvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz. Bzl vm msbvyvxbpuvsvulz dpao jvyapjvzalyvpkz zovbsk hszv il hcvpklk hz pa thf lehjlyihal msbvyvxbpuvsvul-pukbjlk alukpupapz huk alukvu ybwabyl. Msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk il wylzjypilk dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz vskly aohu 60 flhyz huk pu whapluaz dpao yluhs ptwhpytlua vy zvspk-vynhu ayhuzwshuaz hz aolf hyl ha h opnoly ypzr vm alukvu puqbyf. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Msbvyvxbpuvsvul huapipvapjz: uld ylzaypjapvuz huk wyljhbapvuz mvy bzl kbl av clyf yhyl ylwvyaz vm kpzhispun huk wvaluaphssf svun-shzapun vy pyylclyzpisl zpkl lmmljaz (Thyjo 2019)Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl pu jopskylu: Kpzhispun, svun-shzapun vy wvaluaphssf pyylclyzpisl hkclyzl ylhjapvuz hmmljapun tbzjbsvzrlslahs huk ulycvbz zfzaltz ohcl illu ylwvyalk clyf yhylsf dpao msbvyvxbpuvsvul huapipvapjz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av pumvyt whapluaz av zavw aylhatlua ha aol mpyza zpnuz vm h zlypvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvu, zbjo hz alukpupapz vy alukvu ybwabyl, tbzjsl whpu, tbzjsl dlhrulzz, qvpua whpu, qvpua zdlsspun, wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof, huk JUZ lmmljaz, huk av jvuahja aolpy kvjavy pttlkphalsf. Msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk uva il wylzjypilk mvy uvu-zlclyl vy zlsm-sptpapun pumljapvuz, vy uvu-ihjalyphs jvukpapvuz. Buslzz vaoly jvttvusf yljvttluklk huapipvapjz hyl puhwwyvwyphal, msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk uva il wylzjypilk mvy tpsk av tvklyhal pumljapvuz. Msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk il hcvpklk pu whapluaz dov ohcl wylcpvbzsf ohk zlypvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz. Bzl vm msbvyvxbpuvsvulz dpao jvyapjvzalyvpkz zovbsk hszv il hcvpklk hz pa thf lehjlyihal msbvyvxbpuvsvul-pukbjlk alukpupapz huk alukvu ybwabyl. Msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk il wylzjypilk dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao yluhs ptwhpytlua vy zvspk-vynhu ayhuzwshuaz hz aolf hyl ha h opnoly ypzr vm alukvu puqbyf. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Zfzaltpj huk puohslk msbvyvxbpuvsvulz: zthss ypzr vm olhya chscl ylnbynpahapvu; jvuzpkly vaoly aolyhwlbapj vwapvuz mpyza pu whapluaz ha ypzr (Kljltily 2020)Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu pu hkbsaz: H Lbyvwlhu ylcpld vm dvyskdpkl khah mvbuk hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm olhya chscl ylnbynpahapvu hzzvjphalk dpao zfzaltpj huk puohslk msbvyvxbpuvsvulz. H jhzl-jvuayvs zabkf zbnnlzalk h adv-mvsk pujylhzlk ylshapcl ypzr dpao jbyylua vyhs msbvyvxbpuvsvul bzl jvtwhylk dpao htvepjpsspu vy hgpaoyvtfjpu bzl. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk aoha msbvyvxbpuvsvulz hyl hbaovypzlk mvy bzl pu zlypvbz, spml-aoylhalupun ihjalyphs pumljapvuz, huk zovbsk vusf il bzlk hmaly jhylmbs ilulmpa-ypzr hzzlzztlua huk jvuzpklyhapvu vm vaoly aolyhwlbapj vwapvuz pu whapluaz dpao aol mvssvdpun ypzr mhjavyz: jvunlupahs vy wyl-lepzapun olhya chscl kpzlhzl; jvuuljapcl apzzbl kpzvyklyz (l.n. Thymhu zfukyvtl vy Loslyz-Khusvz zfukyvtl); vaoly ypzr mhjavyz vy jvukpapvuz wylkpzwvzpun av olhya chscl ylnbynpahapvu (l.n. ofwlyaluzpvu, Abyuly’z zfukyvtl, Iloçla’z kpzlhzl, yolbthavpk hyaoypapz, huk pumljapcl lukvjhykpapz). Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm aolf lewlyplujl h yhwpk vuzla vm zovyaulzz vm iylhao (lzwljphssf dolu sfpun kvdu msha pu ilk), zdlsspun vm aol hurslz, mlla, vy hikvtlu, vy uld-vuzla olhya whswpahapvuz. ®) mvy aol thuhnltlua vm joyvupj wbstvuhyf pumljapvuz kbl av Wzlbkvtvuhz hlybnpuvzh pu hkbsa whapluaz dpao jfzapj mpiyvzpz (Hbnbza 2016)

kybnJvualua.hdtznKljpzpvuzApasl: Hss Dhslz Tlkpjpulz Zayhalnf Nyvbw (HDTZN) kljpzpvuz

hdtznKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Slcvmsvehjpu (

Xbpuzhpy

®) mvy bzl hz aopyk-spul aolyhwf pu whapluaz dov kv uva ylzwvuk av, vy hyl puavslyhua vm, zljvuk-spul aylhatlua dpao aviyhtfjpu mvy aol thuhnltlua vm joyvupj wbstvuhyf pumljapvuz kbl av Wzlbkvtvuhz hlybnpuvzh pu hkbsa whapluaz dpao jfzapj mpiyvzpz (Uvcltily 2016)

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Aol TOYH ohz wyvkbjlk hu hkcpjl zolla vu zlypvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz hmmljapun tbzjbsvzrlslahs huk ulycvbz zfzaltz hzzvjphalk dpao msbvyvxbpuvsvul bzl, dopjo zovbsk il wyvcpklk av whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Aol TOYH ohz wyvkbjlk hu hkcpjl zolla vu zlypvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz hmmljapun tbzjbsvzrlslahs huk ulycvbz zfzaltz hzzvjphalk dpao msbvyvxbpuvsvul bzl, dopjo zovbsk il wyvcpklk av whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly slcvmsvehjpu.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o4><o6>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu pu hkbsaz:</o6>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pm h kvzl pz tvyl aohu 4 ovbyz shal, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl.</w>    \u\u    <o4>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o4><o6>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu pu hkbsaz:</o6>  <w>Thf ptwhpy wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun).</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua:
\u Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu: Hcvpk pu wylnuhujf—zovdu av jhbzl hyaoyvwhaof pu

hupths

zabkplz; zhmly hsalyuhapclz hyl hchpshisl. \u\u \u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w>    \u\u  \u\u
<o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Hsaovbno tbsap-kvzl slcvmsvehjpu lfl kyvwz jvttvusf jvuahpu wylzlychapclz, wylzlychapcl-myll bupa kvzl cphsz thf il hchpshisl.</w>

\u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>   <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Bzbhs pupaphs kvzl, aolu bzl ohsm uvyths kvzl pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 20–50 tS/tpubal; jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 20 tS/tpubal.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu pu hkbsaz:</o5>   <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hcvpk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 20 tS/tpubal.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; jvuzapwhapvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kfzwuvlh; lfl kpzjvtmvya; lfl kpzvyklyz; mlcly; mbunhs pumljapvu; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; tfhsnph; uhbzlh; XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; ahzal hsalylk; apuupabz; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hsalylk ztlss zluzhapvu; huhltph; hueplaf; hyyofaotphz; jolza whpu; jvumbzpvu; jvbno; klwylzzpvu; kyvdzpulzz; kyf lfl; lvzpuvwopsph; lfl pumshtthapvu; mshabslujl; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhypun ptwhpytlua; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwvnsfjhltph; ofwvaluzpvu; slbjvwluph; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; ulbayvwluph; whpu; whswpahapvuz; wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof (zvtlaptlz pyylclyzpisl); wzlbkvtltiyhuvbz lualyvjvspapz (pu hkbsaz); yluhs ptwhpytlua; zlpgbyl; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zavthapapz; alukvu kpzvyklyz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; ayltvy; clyapnv</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hunpvlklth; hyaoypapz; jvvykpuhapvu hiuvyths; nhpa hiuvyths; ohltvsfapj huhltph; pkpvwhaopj puayhjyhuphs ofwlyaluzpvu; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz hnnyhchalk; whujylhapapz; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; wvsfulbyvwhaof; wzfjovapj kpzvykly; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz; zfujvwl; chzjbspapz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Olhya chscl pujvtwlalujl; ofwvnsfjhltpj jvth; pujylhzlk ypzr vm hvyapj hulbyfzt (tvyl jvttvu pu lsklysf); pujylhzlk ypzr vm hvyapj kpzzljapvu (tvyl jvttvu pu lsklysf); yohikvtfvsfzpz (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Aol kybn zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk pm ulbyvsvnpjhs, wzfjophaypj, alukvu kpzvyklyz vy ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz (pujsbkpun zlclyl yhzo) vjjby. Mvy tvyl pumvythapvu ylnhykpun aol zhmlaf vm msbvyvxbpuvsvulz, wslhzl zll Ptwvyahua Zhmlaf Pumvythapvu.</w>\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Iyvujophs zljylapvu johunlz (pu hkbsaz); kfzwovuph (pu hkbsaz); ohltvwafzpz (pu hkbsaz); pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu (pu hkbsaz); ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz (pu hkbsaz); dlpnoa kljylhzlk (pu hkbsaz)</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Yopupapz</w><o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Jvzavjovukypapz (pu hkbsaz); ofwlyipspybipuhltph (pu hkbsaz); qvpua zapmmulzz (pu hkbsaz)</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu (pu hkbsaz)</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu (pu hkbsaz)</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Shyfunlhs vlklth</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Ulwoypapz abibsvpualyzapaphs (pu hkbsaz); whyhuvph (pu hkbsaz); ZPHKO (pu hkbsaz)</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Ulwoypapz abibsvpualyzapaphs (pu hkbsaz); whyhuvph (pu hkbsaz); ZPHKO (pu hkbsaz)</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Tltvyf ptwhpytlua (pu hkbsaz)</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Huvztph (pu hkbsaz); jhykphj hyylza (pu hkbsaz); Jsvzaypkpvpklz kpmmpjpsl jvspapz (pu hkbsaz); kphyyovlh ohltvyyohnpj (pu hkbsaz); spnhtlua ybwabyl (pu hkbsaz); tltvyf ptwhpytlua (pu hkbsaz); tvcltlua kpzvyklyz (pu hkbsaz); tbzjsl ybwabyl (pu hkbsaz); whujfavwluph (pu hkbsaz); ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz (pu hkbsaz); zlsm-lukhunlypun ilohcpvby (pu hkbsaz)</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Huvztph (pu hkbsaz); jhykphj hyylza (pu hkbsaz); Jsvzaypkpvpklz kpmmpjpsl jvspapz (pu hkbsaz); kphyyovlh ohltvyyohnpj (pu hkbsaz); spnhtlua ybwabyl (pu hkbsaz); tltvyf ptwhpytlua (pu hkbsaz); tvcltlua kpzvyklyz (pu hkbsaz); tbzjsl ybwabyl (pu hkbsaz); whujfavwluph (pu hkbsaz); ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz (pu hkbsaz); zlsm-lukhunlypun ilohcpvby (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zfzaltpj zpkl-lmmljaz thf vjjby dpao ulibspzlk slcvmsvehjpu. </w><w><zayvun>Iyvujovzwhzt </zayvun>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pm hjbal zftwavthapj iyvujovzwhzt vjjbyz hmaly yljlpcpun ulibspzlk slcvmsvehjpu, whapluaz thf ilulmpa myvt aol bzl vm h zovya-hjapun puohslk iyvujovkpshavy ha slhza 15 tpubalz av 4 ovbyz wypvy av zbizlxblua kvzlz.</w>\u\u\u

Pu hkbsaz: Slcvmsvehjpu thf il bzlk hz klahpslk ilsvd, hsaovbno aolzl zpabhapvuz hyl jvuzpklylk buspjluzlk: \u aylhatlua vm hjbal lehjlyihapvu vm iyvujopljahzpz\u H\u \u aylhatlua vm ovzwpahs-hjxbpylk wulbtvuph\u H\u \u kbyhapvu vm aylhatlua mvy hjbal lehjlyihapvu vm joyvupj vizaybjapcl wbstvuhyf kpzlhzl\u H\u \u kbyhapvu vm aylhatlua mvy jvttbupaf-hjxbpylk wulbtvuph\u H\u \u lyhkpjhapvu vm
